body:
Comment 1: 
The issue here is that you can't perform an equality test on an interface value and a
concrete type value.

You can use a type switch to first determine if it's a UnixSignal, and then switch over
all UnixSignals. (see the attached file)

Perhaps modifications to the signal package could make it easier to use. If you have a
proposal, discuss it on golang-dev. Otherwise this is working as intended as far as I
can see.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._ Attachments: 1. signal.go (419 bytes)
